title: House & Buildings SFX
description: A collection of 103 sound effects suitable for houses and other buildings
longDescription:
Introducing the House SFX pack for Unreal Engine!

Introducing the ultimate sound effect pack for creating immersive and realistic atmospheres in houses and buildings! This pack includes 103 high-quality sounds designed specifically for indoor environments. With a diverse range of sounds, this pack provides everything you need to add depth and realism to your projects.

 

With this pack, you'll have access to a wide variety of sounds that will help you create a convincing and immersive indoor environment. Whether you're creating a haunted house or a cozy family home, these sounds will help bring your vision to life.

 

What is in this pack?

This pack contains 103 High quality sound effects suitable for houses and other buildings.

  • 31 Bathroom sounds
  • 34 Door sounds
  • + 3 Knocking sounds
  • + 2 Locking sounds
  • + 7 Doorbell sounds
  • + 2 Folding door sounds
  • + 4 Glass door sounds
  • + 2 Shower door sounds
  • + 1 Trap door sound
  • 10 Clock sounds
  • 3 Creacking sounds
  • 1 Freezer hum sound
  • 1 House heater
  • 1 Smoke detector
  • 1 Switch

 

Want a preview? Check a few of the sounds on SoundCloud!

https://on.soundcloud.com/Pexdn﻿


Got any questions? Feel free to send me an email!

AssetAttic@outlook.com
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  102 High quality game sound effects
  •  14 Catagories
  •  Bathroom sounds
  • Door sounds
  • Utility sounds

Number of Audio Waves: 103

Number of Audio Cues: 103

Sample rate / bit rate: 48.000 Hz

Do Sound FX loop: No

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
